content:
COLLEGE STATION Texas  Texas AM scored two goals in the first  minutes of the game and Oklahoma State could not catch up as the eighthranked Aggies defeated the No PERIOD  Cowgirls  at the Aggie Soccer Complex PERIOD



Texas AM improved to  overall and  in Big  play while OSU fell to  overall and  in conference action PERIOD



 cohead coach Karen Hancock said PERIOD Credit Leah Hope for finding a way to get a goal late in the first half PERIOD We went into halftime down  it is just tough playing catch up on the road in the Big .Giving up two goals in the first  minutes it is always going to be tough to beat anybodyIn an environment like this it is next to impossible PERIOD







Erin Stigler was solid in goal keeping recording a career high five saves PERIOD All three goals she gave up came off headers from a cross two being on corner kicks PERIOD



Oklahoma State will resume action Friday at No PERIOD  Texas at  p.m PERIOD in Austin PERIOD
